summary: This is my BETA version. It is mostly complete and shouldn't have any bugs. Notify me if it does bug out.
descriptionHtml:
This is a weapon package containing powerful weapons. Even though i say it is A Vampire weapon package, anyone can use it and it DOES NOT require Dawnguard since i just used already existing weapons in the original game. This weapon package include 4 standalone re-textures of some swords in the game with a unique enchantment.
Mortalbane: a loathsome dagger that deals 20 pts poison damage per second for 5 seconds. also may reanimate a dead body.
Necrophage: a powerful waraxe that drains 35 pts stamina, turns undead up to level 100, causes an extra 35 pts damage to undead, and has a powerful stagger ability. almost guaranteed to stagger any humanoid for sure.
Shinso Edge: a mighty blade that absorbs 40 pts health and magicka. in addition will soul trap an enemy.
Tyrannus: a wicked sword that causes 40+ pts fire and frost damage.

All of these weapons have unique enchantments and are craftable and temperable. Thy are listed as daedric and you will need the daedric smithing perk. All of them require a human heart to forge, and 5 vampire dust. to temper, all of them require a void salt.
for Tyrannus you must also use an Iron Sword
for Shinso Edge you must also use a Steel Sword
for Necrophage you must also use a Silver Greatsword
for Mortal bane you must also use an Iron Dagger.

Also I would like to add, extreme Special Thanks to Ghosu. This guy is amazing and I would recommend checking out some of his mods
author: SammyEversong
